infotexts.afflictiondescription.EKR_watchersgaze_r: Smoke blocks the view and prevents the unknown being from observing you.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_weapons_cabinet: Use condition to change between sprites
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobox_shotgun_bea: Beanbag ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile, less-lethal.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobox_shotgun_slu: Slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobox_shotgun_hol: Hollow-point slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against soft targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobox_shotgun_fle: Flechette ammunition for a shotgun. Tight grouping of metal flechettes effective against light armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobox_shotgun_gre: Grenade ammunition for a shotgun. Direct-fire grenade which detonates on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobox_shotgun_phy: Physicorium slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_weaponparts: High-precision mechanical parts used for the inner workings of most small arms.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_loadingkit: A case of tools and replacement primers used for loading and pressing most standard Europan Coalition cartridges.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_armored_hardsuit: Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. It is designed with substantial full-body ballistic protection, however the added armor reduces mobility considerably. [ Rated 6000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_armored_hardsuit_pa: Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. It is designed with substantial full-body ballistic protection, however the added armor reduces mobility considerably. [ Rated 6000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.

Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. It is designed with substantial full-body ballistic protection, however the added armor reduces mobility considerably. [ Rated 6000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_armored_hardsuit2: Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. Improved design allows less-restricted movement and overall increased durability. [ Rated 12000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +100%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +50%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_armored_hardsuit2_p: Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. Improved design allows less-restricted movement and overall increased durability. [ Rated 12000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +100%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +50%.

Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. Improved design allows less-restricted movement and overall increased durability. [ Rated 12000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +100%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +50%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shearclaw_outfit: An experimental wetsuit fabricated from Shearclaw scale, offering unparalleled underwater mobility. Its internal armor weave provides light puncture and burn resistance and must be worn together with the Shearclaw Helmet Mk-I to provide pressure resistance. [ Rated 6000m ] \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_armored_hardsuit2_i: Heavyweight pressure suit for used coalition military operations. Improved design allows less-restricted movement and overall increased durability. [ Rated 12000m ]
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_marine_armor: High-performance bulletproof vests modified from ordinary bulletproof vests provide effective defense against attacks, but are much heavier. \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_marine_armor_unifor: Special combat suits woven from bulletproof fibers provide far greater defense than ordinary clothing, but are heavier.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_marine_helmet: A high-performance helmet converted from a bulletproof helmet to provide effective defense against attacks, but is heavier.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_renegade_armor: High-performance bulletproof vests modified from ordinary bulletproof vests provide effective defense against attacks, but are much heavier. \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_renegade_armor_unif: Special combat suits woven from bulletproof fibers provide far greater defense than ordinary clothing, but are heavier.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_renegade_helmet: A high-performance helmet converted from a bulletproof helmet to provide effective defense against attacks, but is heavier.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_merc_armor: High-performance bulletproof vests modified from ordinary bulletproof vests provide effective defense against attacks, but are much heavier. \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +75%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_merc_armor_uniform: Special combat suits woven from bulletproof fibers provide far greater defense than ordinary clothing, but are heavier.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_merc_helmet: A high-performance helmet converted from a bulletproof helmet to provide effective defense against attacks, but is heavier.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_fire_jumpsuit: Specialized firefighting clothing can effectively insulate the damage caused by high temperature.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_fire_helmet: A sturdy heat-resistant helmet and breathing mask.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mechanic_armor: Makeshift armor built from loose ballistic plates and padding. There are many small pouches sewn into the vest. \nIn the Neurotrauma environment, Drainage resistance +50%, Fractured/Dislocation resistance +25%.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_security_radio: A low-profile radio communication system used mainly by ship and station security officers.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ammobandolier: An ammo bandolier, a fine piece to tie together the outfit of any commando.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tacticalbackpack: A compact backpack with moderate storage capacity for gear and ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gaussparts: Fulgurium superconductor. A primary component in producing gauss weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserparts: High-power laser pump. A primary component in producing laser weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_suppressor: Firearm noise suppression, equip using the fabricator, and remove using the deconstructor.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_lightattachment: Tactical illumination device, equip using the fabricator, and remove using the deconstructor. PS: After installation, you need to click on the small menu on the left side to activate the Tactical Light for the weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserattachment: Attachable laser device, equip using the fabricator, and remove using the deconstructor. PS: After installation, you need to click on the small menu on the left side to activate the Laser Sight for the weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_sonarattachment: Sonar detection and tracking device, equip using the fabricator, and remove using the deconstructor.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_piperifle_flashligh: A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_piperifle_laser: A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_piperifle_suppresse: A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.
A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.
A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_flashlight: Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_laser: Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_suppressed: Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_suppressed_: Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.

Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg_flashlight: A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg_laser: A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg_suppressed: A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.
A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.
A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smg_flashlight: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating shells quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smg_laser: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating shells quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smg_suppressed: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating shells quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smg_suppressed_flas: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating shells quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smg_suppressed_lase: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating shells quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tactical_shotgun_fl: Coalition standard tube-fed shotgun. Holds 8 shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tactical_shotgun_la: Coalition standard tube-fed shotgun. Holds 8 shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tazer_flashlight: Delivers an electrical shock that is in most ways comparable to a stun baton, but without its somewhat lacking range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drumlmg_flashlight: Heavy automatic weapon firing 5.56x45mm rounds with supreme sustained fire capability.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_dartgun_flashlight: A compact gas-operated dart gun for administering medicines and other chemicals.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gausspistol_flashli: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gausspistol_laser: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gaussrifle_flashlig: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gaussrifle_laser: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_torpedorifle_sonars: An advanced submarine recoiless rifle developed for use against vessels and heavily armored monsters, fires high-explosive microtorpedoes with considerable range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_rocketlauncher_sona: Heavy marine shoulder-fired launcher developed for coalition special operations, unwieldy and expensive but packs a punch.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_beast_ssl_flashligh: An experimental 30mm-FC autocannon for massive portable firepower.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_battlerifle_flashli: A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_battlerifle_laser: A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_battlerifle_suppres: A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.
A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.
A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserpistol_flashli: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserpistol_laser: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserrifle_flashlig: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserrifle_laser: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolver_flashlight: Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolver_laser: Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolver_suppressed: Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.
Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.
Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammo_large: A heavy box of ammo for the Chaingun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammophysico: A backbreakingly heavy box of ammunition for the chaingun, utilizing Physicorium as its main material. These rounds have enough stopping power to occasionally stun any foe they hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammoexplosi: A heavy box of ammo for the chaingun, loaded with high explosive materials.
A heavy box of ammo for the chaingun, loaded with high explosive materials.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammoheavy: Ammunition for the chaingun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammoheavy_l: Ammunition for the chaingun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammo_large: Ammunition for the coilgun. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammoexplosiv: Ammunition for the coilgun. Explodes on impact. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammopiercing: Coilgun ammo that has piercing capabilities. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammophysicor: Coilgun ammunition made of alien material. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammoboxheavy: Ammunition for the coilgun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammoheavy_la: Ammunition for the coilgun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybrid: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with greatly improved stopping power.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybrid_l: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with greatly improved stopping power. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybridfl: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells equipped with flak warheads.

Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells equipped with flak warheads. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells equipped with flak warheads.
infotexts.entityname.ek_coilgunammohybridflak_smar: Extended Hybrid Flak Proximity Ammunition Box
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybridfl: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells equipped with flak warheads. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybridap: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with anti-armor shaped-charge.

Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with anti-armor shaped-charge. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammo_laser: Experimental coilgun hardware conversion. Large laser array which draws directly from a coalition standard coilgun power supply.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybridto: Ammunition for the coilgun. Heavy caliber conversion, hybrid coilgun shells with greatly improved stopping power.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohybridfl: A flare projection solution in coilgun form. When fired, it creates a bright flare for spotting enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohighvelo: Ammunition for the coilgun. High-velocity composite shells.
Ammunition for the coilgun. High-velocity composite shells. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drone_beacon: Short-range radio beacon. Drones will try to follow the beacon when idle and attack nearby enemies. Floats if dropped in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drone_beaconattack: Short-range radio beacon. Drones will prioritize attacking nearby targets. Floats if dropped in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gundrone: An experimental combat drone designed to be small enough to accompany diving teams on long-range operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gundrone_wreck: A destroyed gun drone, can be salvaged for parts.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_walkerdrone: An experimental combat drone designed for outpost defense and boarding operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_walkerdrone_wreck: A destroyed walker drone, can be salvaged for parts.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drone_multitool: Short-range radio device used to shutdown remote drones.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_pulselaserplasmaamm: A pulse laser cartridge that instead generates helical bolts of plasma. Allows for greater damage but reduces its effective range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_contain: A pressure resistant container designed to be compatible with most systems capable of launching depth charges. Useful for safely disposing of hazardous materials or delivering supplies quicky to the outside of the submarine.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_decoy: An experimental lure and countermeasure platform that halts upon impact, emits a sonar beacon, and detonates after successfully attracting monsters.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_nuclearde: An experimental lure and countermeasure platform that halts upon impact, emits a sonar beacon, and detonates after successfully attracting monsters.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flechette: A specialized railgun shell that when fired bursts into multiple piercing projectiles.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railgun_halfshells: Two half-length railgun shells. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railgun_halfshell: A half-length railgun shell. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railgun_halfshells_: Two half-length armor-piercing shells. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railgun_halfshell_p: A half-length piercing shell. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railgun_halfshells_: Two half-length physicorium shells. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railgun_halfshell_a: A half-length physicorium shell. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_homing: A highly advanced railgun shell with thermal tracking and guidance system, will automatically track to nearby hostile life forms when fired.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_nuclearho: A highly advanced railgun shell with thermal tracking and guidance system, will automatically track to nearby hostile life forms when fired.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flak: A railgun shell designed with multiple outward-facing explosive charges that detonate in sequence. Produces shockwaves capable of rupturing the internal organs of most small creatures, and significantly disorienting larger ones.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flak_smar: A railgun shell designed with multiple outward-facing explosive charges that detonate in sequence. Produces shockwaves capable of rupturing the internal organs of most small creatures, and significantly disorienting larger ones.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_piercings: A railgun shell with a kinetic armor-piercing core.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_armorpier: A railgun shell equipped with an advanced shaped-charge penetrating warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_fusion: Railgun shell carrying a devastating boosted-fusion warhead. Delay fuse detonates after approximately 70m of travel.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_fusion_sm: Railgun shell carrying a devastating boosted-fusion warhead. Proximity fuse detonates when an enemy is detected.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_radiati: Experimental depth charge shell equipped with a high-energy radiation emitter. Use of this device in combat is considered a war-crime under coalition law.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flare: A flare projection solution in railgun shell form. When fired, it creates a short line of flares.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_incendiar: A railgun shell equipped with an incendiary warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_highveloc: A railgun shell with a flat, long-range trajectory.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_cyanide: Depth charge equipped with a payload of cyanide, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_paralyz: Depth charge equipped with a payload of paralyzant, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_radioto: Depth charge equipped with a payload of radiotoxin, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_flare: A flare projection solution in depth-charge form. When fired, it creates a short line of flares.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_chaff: Passive sonar countermeasure in depth-charge form. Disperses a cloud of sonar-disrupting material in a large area.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_chaff: Passive sonar countermeasure in railgun shell form. Disperses a cloud of sonar-disrupting material in a large area.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_piperifle: A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_piperound: The cartridge for a pipe rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_piperound_alien: The Physicorium bullet for a pipe rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolver_flare: Waterproof revolver flare that illuminates a small area.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun: Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_magextended: A high-capacity magazine for a 9mm handgun, featuring a larger ammunition capacity but at a higher cost for the magazine.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_alienmag: A physicorium magazine for a 9mm handgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_handgun_riot_mag: A riot magazine for a 9mm handgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smg: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating rounds quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_riotshield: A lightweight riot shield constructed with a transparent ballistic-resin
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_torpedorifle: An advanced submarine recoiless rifle developed for use against vessels and heavily armored monsters, fires high-explosive microtorpedoes with considerable range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_torpedorifle_round_: Miniaturized dumbfire kinetic slug, launched from a torpedo rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_torpedorifle_round: Miniaturized dumbfire warhead, launched from a torpedo rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_torpedorifle_round_: Miniaturized delayed-fuse warhead, launched from a torpedo rifle.
Miniaturized stun probe, launched from a torpedo rifle.
Experimental high-yeild warhead, launched from a torpedo rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flaregun: An emergency flare gun intended for signaling ships. Fires flare shells to provide illumination.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flare_round: Waterproof signal flare that illuminates a large area. Fired from a flare gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_impact_mine: Advanced contact-triggered buoyant mine. Sensors armed 3 seconds after deploying.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_proximity_mine: Advanced motion-triggered buoyant mine. Sensors armed 3 seconds after deploying.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_double_shotgun: Short double-barrel shotgun. Favored by coalition watchmen as a cheap but effective weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tactical_shotgun: Coalition standard tube-fed shotgun. Holds 8 shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_shell: Buckshot ammunition for a shotgun, containing fewer but larger pellets, offering higher damage and penetration.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_beanbag: Beanbag ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile, less-lethal.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_slug: Slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_hollowpoint: Hollow-point slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against soft targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_alien_slug: Physicorium slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_grenade: Grenade ammunition for a shotgun. Direct-fire grenade which detonates on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_shotgun_flechette: Flechette ammunition for a shotgun. Tight grouping of metal flechettes effective against light armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tazer: It boasts a more powerful stunning effect when compared to a stun gun, without inducing uncontrollable vomiting in the targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tazer_mag: The magazine of the Taser gun can be recharged for reuse.
infotexts.entitydescription.EKR_taser_mag_highvolt: Taser Gun's High Voltage Cartridge, rechargeable for reuse. Higher currents can incapacitate targets instantly, but the recharge time is longer.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flamethrower: Propels a stream of ignited fuel to produce an intense fireball capable of covering a large area.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flamer_incendium: Flamethrower's Incendium fuel, capable of emitting powerful rose-red flames.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_hypergolic_fuel: Unstable self-oxidising fuel mixture, usable underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_alienrifle: Weapons crafted from a certain extraterrestrial material, possessing formidable power.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_alienrifle_mag: The magazine for the Alien Rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_petrobomb: A bottle of ethanol with a soaked bandage wick, a crude but effective incendiary device.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_micro_dartgun: A small hand-operated dart gun often used by renegade assassins.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_dartgun: A compact gas-operated dart gun for administering medicines and other chemicals.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_dart_explosive: A gruesome device which injects a miniature explosive probe that detonates after a moderate delay.
infotexts.entitydescription.EKR_Dart_Ignis: A specially designed assassination dart, carrying a custom-made chemical that ignites the target from the inside out after a brief delay.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg: A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg_mag: A magazine for the Compact SMG that uses 10mm ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg_alienmag: A physicorium magazine for the Compact SMG that uses 10mm ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_mini_smg_riot_mag: A riot magazine for the Compact SMG that uses 10mm ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_rocketlauncher: Heavy marine shoulder-fired launcher developed for coalition special operations, unwieldy and expensive but packs a punch.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_rocketammo_explosiv: Dumbfire rocket with a substantial explosive warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_rocketammo_shortfus: Delayed-fuse rocket with a substantial explosive warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_rocketammo_armorpie: Dumbfire rocket with an armor piercing warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_rocketammo_alien: Dumbfire rocket with an experimental high-yeild warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gausspistol: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds. Requires charging periodically.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gausspistol_mag: The magazine for the Gauss Pistol, utilizing Physicorium ammunition for powerful impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gaussrifle: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds. Requires charging periodically.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_gaussrifle_mag: The magazine for the Gauss Rifle, utilizing Physicorium ammunition for powerful impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drumlmg: Heavy automatic weapon firing 5.56x45mm parabellum rounds with supreme sustained fire capability.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drumlmg_mag: 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition for the Drum LMG.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_drumlmg_alienmag: Physicorium ammunition for the Drum LMG, offering increased firepower.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_smokegrenade: A non-lethal throwable weapon capable of emitting a substantial amount of smoke.Can blind monsters (reduce detection range + decrease shooting accuracy + slow movement). For certain creatures, this smoke is akin to a potent toxin.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_battlerifle: A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_beast_ssl: An experimental man-portable 30mm-FC autocannon for massive suppressive firepower, provided the user is skilled enough to handle the recoil.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ssl_magazine: 30mm composite SSL clip. Used by the experimental 'Beast' man-portable SSL.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_ied: A makeshift shrapnel bomb constructed from loose electronics and a fuel tank.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_breachingcharge: Lightweight shaped-charge device with a small area of effect. Useful for breaching doors and thin hull sections.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_thermiteblock: Aluminothermic agent, capable of producing intense heat when the aluminum powder reacts with the oxidizing agent.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserpistol: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserpistol_mag: The magazine for the Laser Pistol, a specially designed battery that provides the required energy for the Laser Pistol.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserrifle: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_laserrifle_mag: The magazine for the Laser Rifle, a specially designed battery that provides the required energy for the Laser Rifle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_dynamite: An early 'stable' explosive compound made from common organic chemicals. PS: You need to press the use key to activate (default is E).
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolver: Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolverammo: Designed for a revolver, the .357 caliber bullets boast enhanced penetration capability.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolverammo_physic: .357 Physicorium bullets designed for a revolver, boasting increased penetration and lethality.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_revolverammo_riot: .357 Riot Rounds for use in a revolver.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flashgrenade: Produces intense light and noise upon explosion, causing dizziness to all individuals within a certain range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_spear_rocket: A harpoon for the harpoon gun, propelled by a small rocket motor for increased range and impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_divinggrenade: A neutral-buoyancy grenade designed for underwater use. Has a faster detonation fuse than a standard grenade.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_40mmsmoke: Grenade launcher round which bursts into smoke on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_40mmbeehive: Grenade launcher round which fires a spread of solid projectiles.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_40mmthermite: Grenade launcher round which explodes into burning thermite on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_hatchet: Traditionally used for chopping wood on the old blue marble, now mostly used for removing unwanted fungal colonies. Might make a decent weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_captains_sabre: A weapon issued to sea captains of old. An antiquated weapon, but still deadly in the right hands.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_tonfa: A security baton without all the extra bells and whistles.
infotexts.entityname.ek_coilgunammo_depletedfuel_l: Extended Depleted Fuel Coilgun Ammunition Box
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammo_deplete: A heavy box of depleted fuel ammunition for the coilgun. Along with increased penetration, the ammo has been special-made to also inflict radiation sickness on the target. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammo_shredd: A heavy box of ammunition for the chaingun. Designed to shred through flesh and armor of any enemy. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flakcannonammobox_l: A heavy box of wide-spread shrapnel ammo for the flak cannon. Good against swarms. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flakcannondirection: A heavy box of low spread ammo for the flak cannon. Good against single targets. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flakcannonammobox_p: A backbreakingly heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, utilizing Physicorium as its main material. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_flakcannonammobox_e: A heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, loaded with high explosive materials. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.EKR_flakcannonammoboxg: A heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, loaded with alien dementonite-based gravity sphere technology. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunharpoonbox_l: Harpoons that can be fired from a coilgun to reel in targets such as submarines and monsters. (The ammunition capacity of the Extended Ammunition Box is twice that of the regular Ammunition Box.)
